attributes.action: Review "Modernising Medical Careers"  (MMC) scheme and stop interviewing for Training Posts until this is done.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a reorganisation driven by MMC many thousands of Junior Doctors will be left without jobs The interview process for the available jobs was flawed, and under such competition, must be seen to be fair. These are the Doctors the Health service, and you and I, will need in the future. How can we waste the billions that their training cost us? We can't have a better health service without Doctors.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MMC-selection/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
